conduits.name: Divine Call
conduits.description: Divine Shield's cooldown is reduced by 5 sec when you take damage. This effect can only trigger once every <dynamic>30 - 15</dynamic> sec.

conduits.name: Shielding Words
conduits.description: Word of Glory applies absorb shield that lasts 10 sec for <dynamic>15 - 30</dynamic>% healing on the Paladin when used.

conduits.name: Golden Path
conduits.description: Consecration heals you for <dynamic>50 - 100</dynamic>% of Consecration's damage every sec while standing within it.

conduits.name: Stalwart as a Crusader
conduits.description: Crusader Aura reduces all allies' Fear duration by <dynamic>30 - 60</dynamic>%.

conduits.name: Light's Barding
conduits.description: Divine Steed's duration is increased by <dynamic>50 - 100</dynamic>%.

conduits.name: Wrench Evil
conduits.description: Turn Evil's cast time is reduced by <dynamic>50 - 100</dynamic>% and its range is increased by 10 yds.

conduits.name: Echoing Blessings
conduits.description: After it ends, Blessing of Freedom increases the target's movement speed by <dynamic>15 - 30</dynamic>% for 8 sec. After Blessing of Protection or Blessing of Sacrifice ends, the target takes <dynamic>15</dynamic>% less damage for 8 sec.

conduits.name: Light's Reach
conduits.description: Blade of Justice's range is increased by 2 yds and deals <dynamic>20 - 50</dynamic>% more damage.

conduits.name: Truth's Wake
conduits.description: Wake of Ashes burns the target for an additional <dynamic>10 - 25</dynamic>% damage over 6 sec.

conduits.name: Virtuous Command
conduits.description: Judgment grants you Seal of Command for 4 sec, granting your Templar's Verdict, Crusader Strike, Blade of Justice, and weapon attack a 20% chance of dealing <dynamic>10 - 25</dynamic>% additional Holy damage.

conduits.name: Templar's Vindication
conduits.description: Templar's Verdict has a <dynamic>10 - 20</dynamic>% chance to strike again for 6% of its damage.

conduits.name: Enkindled Spirit
conduits.description: Aura Master's cooldown is reduced by <dynamic>30.0 sec - 60 sec</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Resplendent Light
conduits.description: Holy Light heals up to 5 targets within 5 yds for <dynamic>5 - 5</dynamic>% of its healing.

conduits.name: Focused Light
conduits.description: Holy Shock's chance to critically strike is increased by <dynamic>15 - 15</dynamic>%.

conduits.name: Untempered Dedication
conduits.description: Light of the Martyr's damage and healing is increased by <dynamic>15 - 15</dynamic>% each time it is cast. This effect can stack up to 5 times and lasts for 15 sec.

conduits.name: Vengeful Shock
conduits.description: Avenger's Shield causes your target to take <dynamic>15 - 45</dynamic>% more Holy damage for 5 sec.

conduits.name: Punish the Guilty
conduits.description: Shield of the Righteous deals <dynamic>100 - 100</dynamic>% more damage to targets affected by Judgment.

conduits.name: Resolute Defender
conduits.description: Shield of the Righteous extends Ardent Defender's duration by <dynamic>25 - 25</dynamic>%.

conduits.name: Royal Decree
conduits.description: Guardian of Ancient Kings's cooldown is reduced by <dynamic>5 - 10</dynamic> sec, and casting it causes your next Word of Glory to cost no Holy Power.

conduits.name: Prolonged Autumn
conduits.description: Blessing of Autumn lasts <dynamic>30 - 60</dynamic>% longer.

conduits.name: Righteous Might
conduits.description: Vanquisher's Hammer deals <dynamic>100 - 100</dynamic>% more damage and heals you for the damage done.

conduits.name: Hallowed Discernment
conduits.description: Ashen Hallow strikes the lowest health ally and enemy within it for <dynamic>20 - 50</dynamic>% of its effect.

conduits.name: Ringing Clarity
conduits.description: Kyrian Toll has a <dynamic>30 - 30</dynamic>% chance to cast twice on any given target.

covenants.name: Summon Steward
covenants.description:
Call your steward to bring you a Phial of Serenity that can be consumed to restore 15% health and remove all Curse, Disease, Poison, and Bleed effects.

Your Steward additionally offers access to a selection of useful amenities, each once per day.

covenants.name: Purify Soul
covenants.description: Restores 15% health and removes all diseases, poisons, curses, and bleeds affecting you.

covenants.name: Soulshape
covenants.description:
Turn into a Vulpin, teleporting 15 yds forward and increasing your movement speed by 50%. You may reactivate Soulshape every few sec to teleport again.

Lasts 12 sec, or indefinitely while in a rest area.

covenants.name: Flicker
covenants.description: Teleports you forward 15 yds or until reaching an obstacle.

covenants.name: Fleshcraft
covenants.description:
Form a shield of flesh and bone over 4 sec that absorbs damage equal to 20% of your maximum health for 2 min.

Channeling near a corpse claims their essence to grow the shield, up to 50% of your maximum health. This is most effective against powerful enemies.

covenants.name: Door of Shadows
covenants.description: Wend through the shadows, appearing at the targeted location.

covenants.name: Divine Toll
covenants.description: Instantly cast Holy Shock, Avenger's Shield, or Judgment on up to 5 targets within 30 yds (based on your current specialization).

covenants.name: Blessing of Summer
covenants.description:
Bless an ally for 30 sec, causing their attacks to have a 40% chance to deal 30% additional damage as Holy.

<dynamic>Blessing of the Seasons:</dynamic> Turns to Autumn after use.

covenants.name: Blessing of Autumn
covenants.description:
Bless an ally for 30 sec, causing their cooldowns to recover 50% faster.

<dynamic>Blessing of the Seasons:</dynamic> Turns to Winter after use.

covenants.name: Blessing of Winter
covenants.description:
Bless an ally for 30 sec. Their attacks deal (5% of Spell power) Frost damage and reduce enemies' movement speed by 3% and attack speed by 1%, stacking 10 times.

<dynamic>Blessing of the Seasons:</dynamic> Turns to Spring after use.

covenants.name: Blessing of Spring
covenants.description:
Bless an ally for 30 sec, increasing their healing done by 10% and healing received by 20%.

<dynamic>Blessing of the Seasons:</dynamic> Turns to Summer after use.

covenants.name: Vanquisher's Hammer
covenants.description:
Throws a hammer at your target dealing (80% of Spell power) Shadow damage, and empowering your next 

<spec>Retribution</spec>
<dynamic>Templar's Verdict to automatically trigger Divine Storm</dynamic>

<spec>Holy</spec>
<dynamic>Word of Glory to automatically trigger Light of Dawn</dynamic>

<spec>Protection</spec>
<dynamic>Word of Glory to automatically trigger Shield of the Righteous</dynamic>

covenants.name: Ashen Hallow
covenants.description:
Hallow the target area for 30 sec. Every 2 sec, an enemy in the area suffers (100% of Spell power) Shadow damage, and an ally in the area is healed for (120% of Spell power).

Within the Hallow, you may use Hammer of Wrath on any target.

legendaries.name: Final Verdict
legendaries.description: Replaces Templar's Verdict with Final Verdict, a devastating strike that deals (194% of Attack power) Holy damage. Has a 50% chance to activate Hammer of Wrath and reset its cooldown.

legendaries.name: Tempest of the Lightbringer
legendaries.description:
Projects Divine Storm forward 20 yds, damaging all enemies in its path.

Also increases damage dealt by Divine Storm by 20%.

legendaries.name: Relentless Inquisitor
legendaries.description: Spending Holy Power grants you 20 haste per Holy Power spent for 12 sec, stacking up to 20 times.

legendaries.name: Badge of the Mad Paragon
legendaries.description: Hammer of Wrath extends Avenging Wrath by 2 sec and deals 20% additional damage.

legendaries.name: Uther's Guard
legendaries.description:
Your Blessing of Freedom

<condition>Blessing of Sacrifice</condition>
<dynamic> Blessing of Sacrifice</dynamic>

 and 

<condition>Blessing of Spellwarding</condition>
<dynamic>Blessing of Spellwarding</dynamic>

Blessing of Protection cooldowns are reduced by 1 sec per Holy Power spent.

legendaries.name: Liadrin's Fury Reborn
legendaries.description: Casting Avenging Wrath or any Forbearance ability grants 5 Holy Power.

legendaries.name: The Arbiter's Judgment
legendaries.description: Judgment has a 50% chance to reduce the cost of your next Holy Power spender by 1.

legendaries.name: From Dusk till Dawn
legendaries.description:
When you reach 5 Holy Power, you gain Blessing of Dawn. When you reach 0 Holy Power, you gain Blessing of Dusk.

<dynamic>Blessing of Dawn</dynamic>
<dynamic>Damage and healing increased by 6% for 10 sec.</dynamic>

<dynamic>Blessing of Dusk</dynamic>
<dynamic>Damage taken reduced by 6% for 10 sec.</dynamic>

legendaries.name: Inflorescence of the Sunwell
legendaries.description: Infusion of Light has 1 additional charge and its effects are increased by 20%.

legendaries.name: Shadowbreaker, Dawn of the Sun
legendaries.description: Light of Dawn's range is increased to 40 yards, and all allies inside your Light of Dawn receive 10% increased healing from your spells for 6 sec.

legendaries.name: Shock Barrier
legendaries.description: Holy Shock protects the target with a shield of Holy Light for 18 sec, absorbing up to (0.8 * Spell power) damage every 6 sec.

legendaries.name: Holy Avenger's Engraved Sigil
legendaries.description: Your Avenger's Shield has a 50% chance to have its cooldown instantly reset when used.

legendaries.name: The Ardent Protector's Sanctum
legendaries.description: Reduces damage taken while Ardent Defender is active by an additional 10%, and when you activate Ardent Defender, it will also apply to the nearest ally within 15 yards.

legendaries.name: Bulwark of Righteous Fury
legendaries.description: Each target hit by Avenger's Shield increases the damage of your next Shield of the Righteous by 40%.

legendaries.name: Reign of Endless Kings
legendaries.description: When you drop below 20% health, you become infused with the Guardian of the Ancient Kings for 4 sec. This cannot occur again for 45 sec.
